I recommend "The Princess Bride" (1987) directed by Rob Reiner and starring Tim Allen, Elizabeth Holmes, and Fred Stoller.

The plot revolves around a young girl named Princess Buttercup who is forced into a loveless marriage with Prince Edward after their parents die in an assassination attempt on the Queen. The Princess and her beloved fiancé, Prince Edward, embark on a journey to save the kingdom of Cervantes from the clutches of its evil ruler, Don Quixote de la Mancha.
